text: hrux wa phwk than ca klaw wa thæ cring xi brxhim læa xis ma xil læa xis hak læa ya kub læa brrda wngswan hela nan pen phwk yiw hrux pen khrist cng klaw theid(muhammad) wa phwk than ru di ying kwa xallxh kranan hrux hrux xallxh? Læw phu dı ca xthrrm ying pi kwa phu thi pidbang hlakthan ca kxallxh sung mi xyu thi khea læa xallxh nan ca mi thrng phelx nı sing thi phwk cea kratha kan xyu
